Name: Rogun Arena
About the game: Rogun Arena is a game with classic game mechanics from the 90s and early 2000s. The game has 3 of the most popular modes of the 90's: Arena - you will have to fight with crowds of monsters at a high enough speed, which will require you to have a lot of skills. defrag-classic esports mode for time. Levels with simple geometry that make the player use the maximum dexterity and features of classic movement. The game takes into account the parameters of the player's position in space, the angles of inclination of surfaces, jumping (Bunny Hop), the use of weapons for additional effects on the movement of the character. Story game - a game in the classic genre of games from the 90s. You don't need to think too much, you need to shoot and survive.
